TopicTitle: I recently heard about a .mbm-to-.png and reverse converter. Does anyone have a link to it?

Articles.Content:
Hello again! I'm interested in creating my own textures and remakes of the stock parts, but I don't have a way to easily convert .mbm files to .png files and back, so I can't currently. I've heard that there was a program in the past that could convert KSP textures to png's and back, meaning it would be a ton easier to edit textures. If anyone has a link to it, please post it below!

- Avera9eJoe

Have you looked here http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/94638-Mod-Development-Links-Compilation-START-HERE

MeCripp, that page is on the lines of what I want, but it isn't. I want to take the stock textures, and revamp them or edit them. Not create a new part or texture by itself. Thanks though .

Edited April 23, 2015 by Avera9eJoe
Sorry thought this would have been on the list https://github.com/krupski/MBM_Utilities

Sorry thought this would have been on the list https://github.com/krupski/MBM_Utilities

OMG that might be exactly what I'm looking for.

EDIT: Yeah that's exactly what I was looking for. Rep! I highly suggest you post this on the Mod development page and ask for it to be put into texturing. I'm sure I'm not the only one who would benefit. Thanks!

Edited April 23, 2015 by Avera9eJoe
